: : Kup : :

He turned towards Nightlight, and then got closer to the artifact.

Kup: I dont have a clue, lass. Any suggetsions would be helpful, from anyone.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:40 PM
  Subject: Re: At Artifact 1


  Nightlight::

  Nightlight arrived and trasformed to her robot mode "What's that 
  thing?"said the femme while she walked towards the males


  --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  > : : Rodimus Prime / Kup : :
  > 
  > After a while of making their way into the hills, Rodimus Prime and 
  Kup come to a stop at the artifact. It still seemed as if it was 
  emitting heat, and energy seemed to come off of the blue crystal 
  structure.
  > 
  > Both of the bots transform to their robot modes.
  > 
  > Kup: Well would you look at that, lad.
  > 
  > Rodimus Prime: What exactly is it? It almost looks like raw energon 
  but it's not effecting us.
  > 
  > OOC: What size and shape is the artifact?
